fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Select ANY Pirate role that is not taken after night 2 to become.
- Cannot become Crew (Captain) as a selection

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Priority over Amnesiac (Remembering).

Can select on what night he wishes to remember.

Can not be promoted to Crew (Captain) until he has become a role first.

Appears as Not Suspicious until they become a role.

As Smuggler, can visit once per game whilst doing nothing.

CAN remember a crew role of a dead member, but not Quartermaster or Pirate.
